documentation.title: Attribute Bracket Spacing
documentation.standard:
Enforce a fixed number of spaces on the inside of attribute block brackets. By default, 0 (no) spaces are allowed.
Optionally allows for new lines.

code.title: Valid: No whitespace on the inside of attribute block brackets.
Invalid: Whitespace on the inside of attribute block brackets.

documentation.standard: When the option to allow a new line is turned on, the sniff will verify that there are no blank lines at the start/end of the attribute block.

code.title: Valid: No blank lines at the start/end of an attribute block.
Invalid: Blank lines at the start/end of an attribute block.
